GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v4.19.262
GSD.description:
wifi: ath10k: add peer map clean up for peer delete in ath10k_sta_state()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.262 by commit f12fc305c127bd07bb50373e29c6037696f916a8, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit d0eeafad118940fe445ca00f45be5624fea2ec34. For more details please see the references link.
